title: Smart Watch SMS Client
summary: Smart Watch SMS Client fully compatible with circle and box shaped watches
description: TIME LIMITED 62% DISCOUNT - DON´T MISS IT!The first SMS client compatible with circle and box shaped watches that can be installed on every watch with android wear system. It enables the user to read and view all messages and to return back to them quickly even after the application is closed.Among its main advantages belongs simple graphic that uses the OLED display technology. The application works mainly with black color, what saves the battery life during long-lasting listing through the messages.
descriptionHTML:
TIME LIMITED 62% DISCOUNT - DON´T MISS IT!

The first SMS client compatible with circle and box shaped watches that can be installed on every watch with android wear system. It enables the user to read and view all messages and to return back to them quickly even after the application is closed.
Among its main advantages belongs simple graphic that uses the OLED display technology. The application works mainly with black color, what saves the battery life during long-lasting listing through the messages.
comments: Efficiency This app does its job. But I have the lg urban and it separates out going and incoming messages. Incoming messages are under just the phone number while the outbound messages are under the contact's name. If this gets fixed it would be 5 stars.
Want a refund on both of these apps I bought don't do a thing for my samsung s2 gear when I press on app just brings me back to playstore nothing I'm not getting notifications.
Scam Did not work. Asked me to get phone app for $
